verses.text: \w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w Canaanite|strong="H3669"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Arad|strong="H6166"\w*, \w who|strong="H3478"\w* \w lived|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w Negev|strong="H5045"\w*, \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* coming \w along|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w road|strong="H1870"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* Atharim, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w attacked|strong="H3898"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w captured|strong="H7617"\w* \w some|strong="H4480"\w* \w prisoners|strong="H7628"\w*.

\w So|strong="H5414"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w made|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w vow|strong="H5088"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*: “If \w You|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w devote|strong="H2763"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w destruction|strong="H2763"\w*.\f + \fr 21:2 \ft Forms of the Hebrew cherem refer to the giving over of things or persons to the LORD, either by destroying them or by giving them as an offering; also in verse 3.\f*”

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*’s plea \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w up|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w*. \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w devoted|strong="H2763"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w destruction|strong="H2763"\w*; \w so|strong="H7121"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w named|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w Hormah|strong="H2767"\w*.\f + \fr 21:3 \ft Hormah means destruction.\f* The Bronze Serpent

\w Then|strong="H5437"\w* \w they|strong="H5971"\w* \w set|strong="H5265"\w* \w out|strong="H5265"\w* \w from|strong="H5265"\w* \w Mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Hor|strong="H2023"\w* along \w the|strong="H1870"\w* \w route|strong="H1870"\w* \w to|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* \w Red|strong="H5488"\w* \w Sea|strong="H3220"\w*,\f + \fr 21:4 \ft Or the Sea of Reeds\f* \w in|strong="H5315"\w* order \w to|strong="H1870"\w* bypass \w the|strong="H1870"\w* land \w of|strong="H2022"\w* Edom. \w But|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* grew \w impatient|strong="H7114"\w* \w on|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* \w journey|strong="H1870"\w*

\w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w against|strong="H5927"\w* God \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w against|strong="H5927"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*: “\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H5971"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* led \w us|strong="H3588"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w out|strong="H4100"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*? \w There|strong="H5927"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w no|strong="H5927"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w or|strong="H3899"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w detest|strong="H6973"\w* \w this|strong="H1696"\w* wretched \w food|strong="H3899"\w*!”

\w So|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* venomous \w snakes|strong="H5175"\w* \w among|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* \w bitten|strong="H5391"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w came|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w*, “\w We|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*. \w Intercede|strong="H6419"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w so|strong="H5493"\w* \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w take|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w snakes|strong="H5175"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w* \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*.” \w So|strong="H5493"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w interceded|strong="H6419"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, “\w Make|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w fiery|strong="H8314"\w* \w serpent|strong="H8314"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* mount \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w pole|strong="H5251"\w*. \w When|strong="H1961"\w* \w anyone|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w bitten|strong="H5391"\w* \w looks|strong="H7200"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w*, \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w live|strong="H2425"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w bronze|strong="H5178"\w* \w snake|strong="H5175"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* mounted \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w pole|strong="H5251"\w*. \w If|strong="H1961"\w* anyone \w who|strong="H6213"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w bitten|strong="H5391"\w* \w looked|strong="H5027"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w bronze|strong="H5178"\w* \w snake|strong="H5175"\w*, \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w would|strong="H6213"\w* \w live|strong="H2425"\w*. The Journey to Moab

\w Then|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w set|strong="H5265"\w* \w out|strong="H5265"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w camped|strong="H2583"\w* \w at|strong="H2583"\w* Oboth.

\w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w journeyed|strong="H5265"\w* \w from|strong="H5265"\w* Oboth \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w camped|strong="H2583"\w* \w at|strong="H2583"\w* \w Iye-abarim|strong="H5863"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* \w opposite|strong="H5921"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w east|strong="H4217"\w*.

\w From|strong="H5265"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w moved|strong="H5265"\w* \w on|strong="H3318"\w* \w and|strong="H8033"\w* \w camped|strong="H2583"\w* \w on|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w other|strong="H5676"\w* \w side|strong="H5676"\w* \w of|strong="H1366"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Arnon, \w in|strong="H2583"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w extends|strong="H3318"\w* \w into|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Amorite \w territory|strong="H1366"\w*. \w Now|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Arnon \w is|strong="H4124"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w border|strong="H1366"\w* \w between|strong="H2583"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Moabites|strong="H4124"\w* \w and|strong="H8033"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Amorites.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* stated \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Book|strong="H5612"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Wars|strong="H4421"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*: “\w Waheb|strong="H2052"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Suphah|strong="H5492"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w wadis|strong="H5158"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Arnon,

even \w the|strong="H5186"\w* slopes \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5186"\w* \w wadis|strong="H5158"\w* \w that|strong="H5158"\w* \w extend|strong="H5186"\w* \w to|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5186"\w* site \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w Ar|strong="H6144"\w* \w and|strong="H3427"\w* lie along \w the|strong="H5186"\w* \w border|strong="H1366"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H6030"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w sang|strong="H7891"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w song|strong="H7892"\w*: “\w Spring|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* well, \w all|strong="H5927"\w* \w of|strong="H7892"\w* \w you|strong="H6030"\w* \w sing|strong="H7891"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w it|strong="H5927"\w*!

\w The|strong="H5971"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w dug|strong="H2658"\w* \w the|strong="H5971"\w* well; \w the|strong="H5971"\w* \w nobles|strong="H5081"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w the|strong="H5971"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w hollowed|strong="H2658"\w* \w it|strong="H2658"\w* \w out|strong="H2658"\w* \w with|strong="H5971"\w* \w their|strong="H5971"\w* scepters \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w with|strong="H5971"\w* \w their|strong="H5971"\w* \w staffs|strong="H4938"\w*.” \w From|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H5971"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* \w the|strong="H5971"\w* Israelites \w went|strong="H5971"\w* \w on|strong="H5971"\w* \w to|strong="H5971"\w* \w Mattanah|strong="H4980"\w*,

\w and|strong="H1120"\w* from \w Mattanah|strong="H4980"\w* \w to|strong="H5160"\w* \w Nahaliel|strong="H5160"\w*, \w and|strong="H1120"\w* from \w Nahaliel|strong="H5160"\w* \w to|strong="H5160"\w* \w Bamoth|strong="H1120"\w*,

\w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w Bamoth|strong="H1120"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w valley|strong="H1516"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w where|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w top|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w Pisgah|strong="H6449"\w* \w overlooks|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w wasteland|strong="H3452"\w*.\f + \fr 21:20 \ft Or Jeshimon\f* The Defeat of Sihon (Deuteronomy 2:24–37)

\w Then|strong="H7971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Sihon|strong="H5511"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* Amorites, saying,

“\w Let|strong="H5186"\w* \w us|strong="H7704"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w through|strong="H5674"\w* \w your|strong="H5186"\w* \w land|strong="H7704"\w*. \w We|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* cut \w through|strong="H5674"\w* \w any|strong="H3808"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w vineyard|strong="H3754"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w from|strong="H5704"\w* \w any|strong="H3808"\w* well. \w We|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* stay \w on|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w Highway|strong="H1870"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H4428"\w* \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* \w through|strong="H5674"\w* \w your|strong="H5186"\w* \w territory|strong="H1366"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w Sihon|strong="H5511"\w* \w would|strong="H3478"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w let|strong="H5414"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w through|strong="H5674"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w territory|strong="H1366"\w*. \w Instead|strong="H3808"\w*, \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w gathered|strong="H3478"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w army|strong="H5971"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* confront \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*. \w When|strong="H3318"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w Jahaz|strong="H3096"\w*,\f + \fr 21:23 \ft Jahaz is a variant of Jahzah; see 1 Chronicles 6:78.\f* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* \w against|strong="H7125"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w put|strong="H6310"\w* \w him|strong="H5221"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w took|strong="H3423"\w* \w possession|strong="H3423"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H5221"\w* \w land|strong="H1366"\w*, \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Arnon \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Jabbok|strong="H2999"\w*—\w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w only|strong="H3588"\w* \w up|strong="H5704"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w border|strong="H1366"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Ammonites|strong="H1121"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* fortified.\f + \fr 21:24 \ft Or because the territory was rugged; literally because it was strong\f*

\w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w captured|strong="H3947"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Amorites \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w occupied|strong="H3427"\w* \w them|strong="H3947"\w*, \w including|strong="H3605"\w* \w Heshbon|strong="H2809"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* \w villages|strong="H1323"\w*.

\w That|strong="H3651"\w* \w is|strong="H3651"\w* \w why|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* poets say: “\w Come|strong="H5892"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w Heshbon|strong="H2809"\w*, \w let|strong="H3651"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w be|strong="H5892"\w* \w rebuilt|strong="H1129"\w*; \w let|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w Sihon|strong="H5511"\w* \w be|strong="H5892"\w* \w restored|strong="H1129"\w*.
